content.detailedDescription:
Arrived from work, dragged telescope onto balcony to study two blue stars i seen the night before.  scope in place looking through eyepiece searching the sky, nothing.  first i thought i failed to removed lens cover; checked, cover was not there.  looking outward wondering, perhaps i was wrong and there had never been any blue stars. 

alone looking northward and enjoying the peace, i caught many other twinkling stars in the heavens extinguishing in clumps. than by surprise i came to realize developing before my eyes a huge (closed) "v" shape or triangle shadow was slowly, silenty approaching and causing immediate area within to darken.

just moments earlier, i felt rather cold and was planning a retreat inside for some warmth.  however, now i found myself unable to move or turn away for fear of losing sight of this unusual yet astonishing event. carefully laying ear and listening for any sound it might've been admitting but sorry to say i detected not a whisper.

living on the 33rd floor (very top) offers a view like no other.  a plus, maybe a gift, but that night had been exceptionally quiet.

as it carefully neared i was allowed to distinguish two outstanding colors: an over whelming brown or dark-orange and at its trailing a smaller but vivid black trim. being i witnessed color, i thought it must not be flying very high and the streetlights are rendering reflective illumination. from my position (and perhaps excitment) i failed to recongnize nothing more than two deimensions.  residing at co-op city, the the tower i live in is large in size. nonetheless, the object in the sky i sensed would have covered most if not the entire building.

the event took nothing more than two minutes.
content.summary: Standing on my balcony looking north to north east i saw a huge triangle

content.detailedDescription: Well anyways,  its been a long time ago 10yrs maybe 12 i lived by the lake of egypt (that's what i spotted it over the power plant) moving slowly.  i was out for walk going down to the b.P. fuel station. and was crossing the railroad tracks. just enjoying the weather.  (mid-summer) around the power plant were i was in a wooded area i was lookin at the sky cause its was so clear and i turned around and saw a section with no stars.  it was moving very slow, stars were there and then gone. it freaked me out and i got behind the hill slope by the railroad tracks. it was heading north towards the tree line. i could not see to make a messurement on how long it was, but i was going by what stars i couln't see to ones i could. i'm thinkin that it was about the length longer than a foot ball feild. with one light out front tip and 2 in back. the size of it dwarfed the power plant size. after it went all the way past the tree line i ran to the b.P.  i didn't say anything to anyone but i called the marion airport. ifinally got a hold of someone in the tower and i asked them if there was anything over the lake in the last 2hrs he put me on hold for 5 mins and came back with why i was asking and answerd no and what was my name and i hung up.  i asked a friend of my parents that lived at the lake if they ever see anything weird in the skies around there house (u can see the power plant from there house) she replied all the time (older couple likes to sit on front deck.  (backround) loved to put model planes thogether when growing up and could name anything almost with running light on at night)(plez don't use my   e-mail for anything else but feed back  trust ya thanks)
content.summary: Cigar .. but more a triangle layed down flat 3 lights

content.detailedDescription:
Thank you for taking the time to read this.  i'm not sure if what i saw was something conventional, but the more i think about it, the more i don't think so.  it was sunday, december 17th, 2006, around 8:40 pm.  sometimes i go for night walks with my dog; it was a nice night, so i decided to take her along my usual route.  

i walked out onto my driveway and saw the object in the sky.  it was hard to see, because it was so dark, but it was rectangular, black, with five white lights in an x-shaped pattern.  there was a strobing white light on the top and a strobing red light in the middle.  the way it appeared to my eyes, it was flying just over the tree tops - not literally, but in the way it appeared.  at first, i thought it was a plane.  planes fly over my neighborhood all the time, both in the day and at night, so this didn't seem to be anything unusual.  but then i stopped walking and noticed that it didn't make any noise.  i wasn't quite sure of its altitude and size, but i knew for a fact it was either flying low and average size (about a single engine prop plane), or flying high and big (passenger jet size).  i'm inclined to believe the former, but once again, i'm not sure.  in either situation, i knew the plane should have made more noise than it did.  i thought i heard the sound of a plane at first, but there were a couple other planes flying higher up, and it was a little windy.  but as it flew further east, there was no noise whatsoever.  

my mind was completely empty; i was very mindful throughout the whole experience.  the only sounds were the sounds of cars in the background (i live in a suburban area near a road that is used often).  it was moving at a slow, constant speed, very smoothly.  it never sped up or slowed down.  as it flew further east, it gradually disappeared from sight.  i continued my walk, trying to make sense of it.  i'm still debating with myself whether it was a plane or something else.  i don't know.  it was the noise that really did it for me.  planes, even small ones, make lots of noise.  i'm not on expert on aircraft, but that i know.  

i waited about a week to report this, because frankly i think people would think i was crazy.  after doing some research, this is the only organization i believe i can report this to and be taken seriously at the same time.  i don't want to talk about it on some random internet forum, because a lot of those people are prejudiced and will believe almost anything.  it hasn't affected my life that much.  i've been continuing on without obsessing over it.  but i just thought somebody should know.  if you absolutely have to contact me, i would prefer email, please.  i don't want this to be common knowledge.  once again, thank you for your time.  i hope i can be of some help in your research.

sincerely,

dan crowley
content.summary: Walking my dog, saw object above trees; five white lights in x pattern, and strobing red and white lights.  was completely silent.

content.detailedDescription:
My family was surprised by flashing lights by the swamp and we went to look and stood by the back gate we were afraid to go back to the lights
thats all any of us rembered till later,we went to the area later and found two circular swirls,one small one larger and alot of chicken feathers and small foot prints.
later in the same year something burned a circle area nearly 12 feet in diameter that did not create a hole but the ground to powder the next my brother poked a stick in the powder and burned the stick.
we reported it and people came to investigate they had geiger counters and did different things and told us it was from a train ash and steam engines werent running then and it would have had to roll downhill and burn a path along the way they treated us like we were dumasses.
thank you
philip wessel
content.summary: Flashing lights in swampy area near  back field

content.detailedDescription:
Returning from lunch to my grade school(four blocks away) i observed two shiny silver discs spinning around each other closely at a high altitude(several thousand feet).  they were quite close to each other.  no noise.  a beautiful sunny day, clear sky, no clouds at all.  later they same year i observed a spinning disc, this time from a top or bottom view.  it was over a large church near my school.  it went down behind the church and was gone.  i was about 12 years old at the time of these sightings.  the feeling i had seemed to be that there was no danger.

many years later (1982) summer, aiea,hawaii near honolulu on oahu.  i was watching the night sky through binoculars.  since i am ex-air force (age 37 at the time) and familiar with almost all aircraft types- i consider myself a qualified observer on aircraft.  hawaii has a lot of military activity.  especially aircraft.  pointing my binoculars skyward i observed what i believed to be a satellite.  a high track and very smooth.  far far above where the aircraft flying in the area would be. ( i had observed many satellites before this.)  track was south to north.  it was a bright object much the same as a satellite.  all of a sudden it stopped!  i knew right then it was not a satellite.  it sat motionless for a few seconds and then did a "z" shaped maneuver and shot off at very high speed and disappeared.  i believe it was not an aircraft but something else.
these have been my only three sightings but, i remember them as if they happened yesterday.  thanks.
content.summary: Two silver discs spinning around each other...

content.detailedDescription: My mother and i were on our way back from a family members house, and we were about 2-3 minutes away from my house. just as we were about to turn onto our street my mother and i saw a very bright ball, white in color moving very fast but it was silent. i wasnt able to judge the distance or size of the object. we were pretty startled. i have never seens something like that before. i have seen meteor showers, but nothing ever like this. meteors i have seen before were very small and i was only able to see them for a split second, but thats what struck me about this object, it didnt appear to be moving as fast as the meteors i have seen before, but it was moving very fast, and it was clearly visible for about 5-8 seconds before it went past the horizon.
content.summary: Very large bright and fast moving sphere, possibly a meteor

content.detailedDescription: To anyone interested in ufo, or unidentified lights in the sky, the place to go is rains county texas.  my wife and i lived there for several years, and have seen these lights on several occasions.  we were once followed from our church by a mysterious light, and i actually stopped in the road, got out, and looked at it.  it hovered behind us for several minutes, then moved off to the south slowly.  we actually watched one from our front porch one evening, and i called the sheriff's department to see if they could identify it.  they said that they could not.  these lights have been seen by many people in that area, and there is one story of a very close encounter to, according to him a space ship.  he was a teen age boy, and for years, he was afraid to go out by himself after dark, after this encounter.  i am a commercial pilot, and have never, in over a half century seen any ufo, while in an aircraft.  but i can also identify an airplane, heliocopter, or any other flying machine, and let me tell you that these lights are not any aircraft that i know of.  the lights seem to occupy a place, over deep woods, south and west of the city of emory, texas.  if you should go to the flats community, just ask anyone about the lights.  they'll tell you.  the lights seem to appear. and ,move around soundlessly.  also they flash red, green, and white lights, but unlike any navigational lights, strobes, or rotating beacons on airplanes.  sometimes they are high in the sky, but at other times, they are low, and seem to stop in mid air, hover then move off.  most everyone in this area has seen them at one time or another.  good hunting.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Lights in the sky

content.detailedDescription: It was all white moving very fast and it made a 90* turn, and then out over the sea and out of site in about 10-20sec like someone turned off the light. there was one other person with me at the time, but she stated she would not talk too know one about, when i told her we needed to report it. i saw the far in her face and she was very upset after this and asked me not to tell other and if i did, not to tell her name to no one.
content.summary: A white light about 1000-1500 ft over the water.

content.detailedDescription: I was walking my dog spike down by the water.When it came in to the sky it was cinda blinding at first but. i could make it out some what it was a white ball surounded in fire. spike was barkingat it for the short time it was thare. i felt lots of anxitey and fear but when it was gone i felt lormel agaen spike colmed down and we wolked home and i went to bed.
content.summary: Ball of fire shooting acrose the sky.

content.detailedDescription: Wife and i on south side of house on deck looking for a passing comet that was in the news. dont remember which one. dont remember the date. it was a long time ago. 12-15 years......Cold  very clear night. we were both wrapped in blanket. she in front of me facing away from me. my arms around her holding the blanket aroud her shoulders looking west south west. can not tell the distance. could have been one mile, could have been three miles. this glowing red orb traveled in a definate figure eight pattern. then stopped. then again in a figure eight. slowly, back and forth. then up and down, then stopped then again figure eight, then stopped. at first i thought it could have been a mars. then because of the movement i thoght it was a plane. then realized that the pattern was repeating but it was not really treveling anywhere. just in the same general area. this contunued for far longer than we cared to remain in the cold. i remember asking her if she saw what i saw. we both watched its movement for about ten or fifteen minutes in the same exact location continuing the strange figure eight, stop, repeat. went back in house. i still can not determine or guess what it was but i still look in that direction at night wondering if i will ever see it again. it left me with a feeling of ambiguity. i know what i saw was happening because it was verified by my wife. but i do not know what it was. there was no sound or noise at all. i dont know what would make a manned vehicle travel in this manner except maybe a helicopter covering a traffic accident. but again, no noise, no other lights. very  strange, indeed........
content.summary: glowing orb in a figure eight pattern, then stationary

content.detailedDescription: I was walking east out of a door when i looked up to the sky. from blanding blvd looking eastward, i could see very clearly a silver, disk shaped object flying from south to north. it seemed to rock from side to side on its northerly axis as it flew. it was only traveling about 50 miles per hour and there were some clouds out. as it traveled northerly, it would appear and disappear in the clouds which helped me to judge the distance which was approximately .5 miles from my location. after a couple of minutes, it disappeared for good behind a cloud and ultimately the buildings that were surrounding my location.
content.summary: Watching the night sky

content.detailedDescription:
This event took place in december of 2000.  i was in college at the time.  i'm a lawyer now and have not told too many people about this because of the obvious ridicule.  for that, i request that i remain anonymous.  
my friends and i were on vacation from college for the holidays.  we all met up at "the nature trail" in a neighborhood called "the landings."  we all grew up together there and the nature trail is a place we used to hand out when we were kids.  the nature trail is a trail that leads out to a covered area with benches on the intracostal waterway where we used to fish.  
that night, 3 of my friends and i were out at the intracostal talking when i observed something glowing under the water about 1.5 to 2 miles from where we were.  i observed this for about 30 seconds.  the object the rose out of the water and began to ascend slowly.  at this time i turned to a friend and asked "what the hell is that?"  he turned and observed the object and had no answer.  the object appeared to be 30 to 50 meters in length and was glowing a bright red-orange.  we observed the object in the air, slowly ascending, for approximately 20 seconds. as we were watching, i told my other friends to direct their attention to the object.  my other two friends were able to observe the object for approximately 2 seconds before the object flashed up into the atmosphere.  
i felt very confused as did my friends.  the two that only observed it for a few seconds blew it off as nonsense.  the two of us that observed it for longer were left speechless. before that incident i was very much a skeptic and had no idea that ufos had ever been reported traveling under the water.
content.summary: Uso to ufo off of the intracostal waterway of sarasota

content.detailedDescription: It was early october and i was visiting a friend its was about 5:00 pm. we were outside on his porch when he told me to look up i did and i was shocked. at first they appeared to be balloons at first that was until they started forming square an triangle patterns around a larger red object made up of four red spherical objects that were in a square shape two on one side two on the other. when one flew away and several came from the other side i was convinced that they werent balloons. we lost sight of it when the objects passed behind some trees heading ne out in the direction of the ocean.
content.summary: 30+ sphereical objects doing complex flight formations flying away and coming back as well as flying around a larger central object heading east toward ocean

content.detailedDescription: I was with my best freind greg and he had gotton a telescope for christmas.It was pretty late around 1-2 a.M in the morning and it was either january or febuary.. it was a cold clear night and a good time to try out the telescope. so we went out to the foot of my road, catskill dr in franklin and set up the scope.Where we lived was across from the woodhill cemetary,and a couple of large fields that used to be the woodhill farm. and pretty much from being up on a hill above franklin and on a clear night, could see the town of franklin and all the way out into miamisburg ohio, to the north. we were out there for awhile and greg was looking through his scope and talking to me at the same time, when all of a sudden i looked up at what at first glance was a huge blood red moon! and i can clearly remember saying "god, look at the moon" and greg looks up from what he was doing, at the same time i glance over to where he's standing and realize that the moon is over there, to my left!! this thing what ever it was, looked about twice the size of the moon and it made no sound. at first it was very still, then began to slowly move untill it was directly across from us and above the field. then it began to slowly lower, straight down, and the intensity of the light, still circular in shape but as it lowered it suddenly went from huge to about the size of a car. we watched it untill it went slowly down behind some thickets but i could still see where it was from the red light which then began a strobe like sequence of flashing and intensity of the light would go bright, brighter, brightest then repeat still no sound at all! i felt like i could'nt look away from it and when it began the strobing i felt this overwhelming urge to go toward where it was, but i managed to turn away from it and looked over at my friend.  he was absolutly fixated on it like a transe or thousand yard gaze!! i turned and ran. i just left my friend standing there staring. about ten or twenty minutes later , began to feel an overwhelming sense of guilt for leaving greg so, i started back toward where he was. we met about half way and although he could hear me run away greg seemed to have lost track of the amount of time and also couldnt say what happened to the light or really didnt have any recollection of what happened (after i left his presence). i asked him a million questions but greg seemed to think that he almost immediatly turned and followed me when in reality it was actually some time..We were in the seventh grade when this happened and it was like early 1980 january or febuary and i will never forget it!! please if anyone reads this, that also saw someting similar, in the area of franklin or middletown ohio please contact me
content.summary: It was a large red circular object. that at first, appeared to be the moon

content.detailedDescription: On my way to work, driving down i-75, northbound, (this was the first sighting, approx. three weeks before the one dated here), a huge-ball shaped object, with the most beautiful color of blue appearred out of nowhere, flew overhead, and as fast as it appearred, it vanished before my eyes.  i have thought of all "the could bes", and, nothing fits.  approx. three weeks later, driving (mind you, the time of seeing this both times was within the same hour of 9:45pm-10:30pm), i am sure of the time due to work schedule.  the second sighting of this object, which was the same exact description as the first, i was driving southbound on telegraph rd. when i seen it in the eastern sky as it was heading more towards toledo this time, near lake erie.  i am so very curious to know if anyone else has seen this, and has any information as to what they think it might be.  this object appearred out of nowhere, and just vanishes, dissappears.  this is not a fire-work, this is not any type of flare, this is something that made my heart stop, it hasn't left my thoughts; especially the shade of blue that it was, unique.
content.summary: Seen a huge, beautiful-colored blue, ball shaped object appear, fly and dissappear

content.detailedDescription:
Having served in the military i am used to the distant sound of incoming aircraft. i was sitting on my porch when i could hear a low flying helicopter approaching. i went out to see what kind it was and spotted the copter coming in from the west it passed over my home unusually low and saw it was all black in color with no markings. i took out my binoculars and got a closer look as it was passing slow, still i could not see any markings as it passed for a second time. i shrugged it off as nothing to be concerned about. that is when i noticed an unusual amount of air traffic. i counted some 8 aircraft in the sky at various altitudes. that is when i noticed this odd blue and white flashing in the western sky but it was not moving it was just hovering. i looked through my binoculars and could see a long white light alternating blue and white in a rapid fashion almost like a police cruiser warning light.
i watched this thing for what seemed to be forever but it never moved. i counted 3 aircraft that either passed over it or under it as if it was not there. i did place a call to the airport and all they said is it could be a satellite but they do not see anything on their screen that is unusual. i went back out and saw it was still in the same spot then even though this was a perfectly clear night with no clouds this thing moved in a slow zig zag pattern just a short distance the lights went out on it and it disappeared. this was not the first time i saw this as i have seen it on 4 other occasions. this was the first time i called the airport about it.
content.summary: Spotted a blue and white flashing light in western sky

content.detailedDescription:
I've seen two, this was my first, my second i need to find the people i was with, which i consider more probable since i was with 2 other people in the daytime. 

i just got off work and was driving home on i-80 heading west. i just passed the wells exit and i was looking at the outline of the sierra's in front of me, like i always do, when i saw a bright light. it was brighter than the stars, and i could tell it was in our atmosphere. i was puzzled, and i just saw signs in the theatre a couple days before, so i might have been "seeing" things. but it was so real. i looked around the skyline to make sure it wasn't a plane or a tower or something. it just sat in the sky. i passed virgina street overpass and quickly looked for the object since my view was obstructed for a couple seconds, and it was still there. i was getting ready to get off at my exit, keystone ave, so i slowed down to stare at this bright light. right before i exited, the object suddenly took off to the south for about 2 seconds, then disappeared. since i was becoming paranoid, i sped home, locked myself in my apartment, checked every corner, and fell asleep 2 hours later.
content.summary: Bright light in the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were relaxing on the shore of jubilee lake in the blue mountains of oregon when we both saw a:

metalic cilindrical shape ufo, silent no sounds.  elevation approx. less than 2,000 ft, length approx. 70 to 80+, diameter approx. 30 ft. observed over jubilee lake, blue mountains.  there were very few clouds, mostly clear and very bright summer day. i'm a research engineer for a national labortory and may not be able to disclose anything further about what i do since i have a valid doe security clearance.  i have armed forces traing in observations and detections of enemy forces and served in combat during the vietnam war.
content.summary: Observed a cilindrical metallic shaped ufo flying over jubilee lake

content.detailedDescription: I am not the one who has seen this event but a close freind of mine who is wanted by the law never wanted to take it any further in fear that he would be taken by the law but when he told me the story and than the pictures he took . i am a firm beleiver that these pictures are of nothing from this planet. the pictures are3 fairly good and i know this person knows nothing about computers or graphics in any form that would make me beleive that these pictures are altered in any way . he is what we say as computer iliterate. if you are interested in seeing more these pictures please contact me . i learned of your sight by a tv program.
content.summary: Lights in in rowes of odd shapes that moved faster than anything known

content.detailedDescription:
first off, i would like to explain that i do want to remain anonymous so i didnt use my real name and address.
 this is more of a group of sitings that spans at least a decade. 
1. first siting: now im not sure about this first story. i was so young at the time that i have a hard time telling wether it was a dream or reality. 
its more like an impression.
 at the time i was living in mississippi. in a little town called clinton. 
 as a 5 or 6 year old child i tended to be more of the fearfull type. didnt like the dark or any thing else i was uncertin of. 
 now, i can remeber that i did for sure take a bath. as i did every night befor i went to bed. every thing from there is kind of fuzzy but ill explanin as best i can.
 i remeber i woke up about 9pm. i started walking from my room to the front door. i look over at my dad, who was up watching tv and its like hes looking at me but not doing anything. 
 i opened the door and walked out. this was very strange considering i was scared of the dark and my father would have stopped me im sure. 
 when i got out side there were 4 to 6 silver dollar sized ordbs of red light. they seemed to orbit each other and then thats it and i woke up in my bed.
 but heres where it gets strange. my feet were slightly dingy. as if i had been walking on concreat bare foot. which i was, or was i?
 i told my dad but he said i had a dream but it felt like so much more.

2. secound story: now, the first story didnt have any signifigance untill that is i moved to clarston, michigan. 
 i know the exate date on this one. july 4th 1995 or 96. i was about, anywere from 12 to 14 years old.
 i was walking around my nieghborhood(appartment complex) looking at people lighting fire works.
 i was walking back to my apartment and there was a property fence straight in front of me. i saw this red ball that was about the size of a soccer ball. it slowly floated to the ground behind the fence. i ran to see what it was because it was like no firework id ever seen. 
 i ran up to the fence and pulled my self up so i could take a peak at what it was but there was nothing. no singed grass. no smell of black powder. nothing.
 i ran and told my dad and of course "it was probobly a firwork" he said.
and thats were this ends and a new begins.

3. third story: a few mounths after the secound story i had another run in with this red ball.
 i remember i had got a good report card from school and my dad said that i could get this junior circutry kit from radio shack. that i had my eye on for somtime. similar to this http://www.Radioshack.Com/product/index.Jsp?Productid=2102913&cp=2032062.2032398.2032405&parentpage=family 
 when i got home i went right to work. i made a motion circute that detected motion. i set it up next to the door of my room and called in my dad to see if it would work. my dad walked in an a high pitched screach pored from the tiny speaker.
 proud of what i had done, i placed the circute i built right under my bed and went to sleep.
 i awoke to the sound of my motion circute. "strange, i thought i turned that off." i thought. so i reached down and removed the wires from the battery. as i was rising back up to lay down, i saw a red glow comming from the window that was next to my bed. i stuck my fingers in between the blinds and pulled down. this red ball was inches from my face. only a thin piece of glass came between me and the ball.
 then it was like i woke up from a dream. and considering the other sitings ive had, i would say it was real.
 i didnt tell my dad about this one cause he wouldnt have beleved me anyway.
 
4. fourth story: now, it had been somtime since i had any other type of event happen. but a few years later. i was about 16 or 17. 
 i was now living in a house. still in clarkston, michigan. 
 i went out on to my back porch to have a ciggaret behinde my dads back. i lit the smoke and it was like i blinked and more than half the ciggaret was gone. ?. i had no taste of tobacco in my mouth no smell of smoke and the ash was still there, still hangging loosly to the coal. i would say i have about 2 to 3 minutes that i cant account for. 
 ive heard other people explain this happening to them and belevie they were abucted. 
 after a day or so my big right toe started to itch. i scratched it so hars i made it bleed. after cleaning the wound i noticed a callis with a black dot deep in the center. ive heard stories about things being implanted inside people befor. and lot have been found in the foot.

 i can say in all insatnces, ive only seen this ball for in upwards of minutes. not very long at all.
 basicly i just want answers... ive found stories of there red balls that have been seen since the late 1800's. so i know im not crazy.
 thank you for listening to what i have to say and i hope i hear back from sombody.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.shape: Circle,  Fireball,  Flash,  Sphere,  Other,  Unknown
content.summary: Red ball

content.detailedDescription: The sighting occurred in the november - december timeframe of 1988. i was driving home from my place of employment in warren michigan. i was heading north into oakland county. when we were let out of work, there was a driving winter storm blowing. snow had already accumulated 6" on the ground and it was still coming down at 1-2" / hour. visibility was less than 50'. i was first north bound on mound road but then moved west to either ryan or dequindre road to continue north. i was in a line of north bound traffic (north of 15 mile rd) in this driving (sideways) snow when all of a sudden, the road was illuminated "bright white" in front of me. the light moved north at the same speed of the traffic.  i was so focused on driving that initially i didnt give it much thought thinking that it was a traffic helicopter or something related. after a few minutes however i thought, there is no sound and nobody would be flying in these conditions. curiosity then got to me so i slowed my vehicle, cracked the drivers window down 2" and looked above and rear to my 8 o'clock position. what i saw was a swept semi circle of red and white lights hovering above the road. because of the weather conditions and limited visibility, i estimate it was < 100' above me. it made no sound and continued to pace its travel with north bound traffic. after a few more minutes, the lights went out and it was gone or no longer visible. to date, i still do not know what it was. there had to have been scores of other (traffic bound) witnesses that saw it that day.
content.summary: Ufo hovers over evening sterling heights traffic during snow storm

content.detailedDescription:
I witnessed a low flying object with low engine roar (like the sound of a jet inside) with center bright light and 6 lights on either side of the object. no wing tip/tail lights observed, so i know it was not a plane. 

the next day there was an article in the valley news, a local paper about other sightings in the town of windsor and hartland vermont. i live in hartland vermont and was outside walking home from work at a local restaurant. 

the valley news newspaper had a ufo reporting number, which i called the next day. did not hear back from anyone as to this. 

i was fascinated and had no fear, but they flew right over my head, about 
100-150 feet above me.

i felt that it was flying too low and would hit the hills to the west, but did not.

i kept it in sight for about 5-10 minutes. 

someone from woodstock vermont felt that it was a plane refueling other planes, but where were the wingtip and tail lights?

because it was dark outside, the lights were coming in the direction that i was walking towards, my house.

people in the town of windsor vermont observed gridwork underneath the object, which was reported in the newspaper. these people were in a lighted parking lot at a local grocery store.
content.summary: 3 white lights in shape of triangle in night sky

content.detailedDescription:
On tuesday, june 13, 2006 at approximately 5 a.M. i was traveling southbound on i-71 through ohio near mile marker 70 (30 miles south of columbus) when i noticed a bright white light off to the left (east) side of the road.  at first i thought it was an airplane because i saw a center white light with two smaller lights on either side of the object, like landing lights on wings.  also, i could tell there was at least one blinking light on the bottom, which appeared red.  as i got closer i could tell the object was stationary at an altitude of approximately 300 feet and a distance of perhaps a ��� mile off of the highway.

when parallel to the object i could tell this was definitely not an airplane, due to being stationary, and definitely not a helicopter, due to several bright white lights being on top of the object as well.  at this distance i could still not determine the exact shape of the object, but could tell that it had very intense white lights on all surfaces, a red blinking light on the bottom and perhaps a blue blinking light on the bottom.  due to the blinking lights i was not very suspicious since blinking lights usually signal to me that it is some type of known aircraft.

as i continued south i saw 11 more of these objects, all between mile marker 70 and 50, for a total of 12.  all had the same description as the one above and all were stationary between 200 and 400 feet off the ground and from ��� to 1 mile off to the left the road.  most were somewhat equally spaced in distance as i traveled down the road, but i saw one occurrence of 3 in a triangular pattern with a distance of maybe a ��� mile in between each.  this area of ohio is mostly flat open farmland with small gatherings of houses and buildings (maybe 4 or 5 in a group).  all of these objects seemed to be above these groups of houses.

when i approached mile marker 50, i hadn���t seen one of these objects in perhaps 5 miles when i suddenly noticed one off to the left again but this one was moving parallel to i-71.  after a mile or so the object turned southeast and left the area very quickly, followed closely by 3 more of these objects.  they finally faded out of side just before mile marker 50.  i believe these to be objects that i had previously seen so i did not add them to my count.  this was the last i saw of these objects that morning.  i was heading out of state at the time and returned at the end of the week.  while out of town i thought about what i had seen and came upon the idea that these may have been the tops of radio or other communications towers and i would look for these the next time i traveled through the area.  i was skeptical of this idea however since i looked for frames under the lights but could not see anything.

on friday, june 16, 2006 i traveled back through the area at approximately 10 p.M. going northbound.  i began watching the skies around mile marker 50 to see if any of these objects remained.  i saw several radio towers, but all of these had blinking red lights along their frames and these frames were easily visible in the dark.  i approached mile marker 60 near jeffersonville and still had not seen anything when i noticed 2 lights on the left side (west this time) of i-71 and they looked very similar to what i had seen earlier in the week.  these lights were still about 5 miles ahead of me perhaps around mile marker 65.  

as i got closer i could see the lights better and they were on the west side of 71 approximately ��� mile apart and much to my surprise, one was slowly moving out overtop 71.  even more to my surprise i knew i was going to be driving directly under the object.  the object was a very pronounced ���v���, with large circular blue lights running along the entire bottom of the shape, perhaps 6 or 7 on each length of the ���v���.  on the tip of the object, there was a flashing red light on the bottom.  the leading edges of the object were covered with bright white lights as well as the top.

i was not the only person to see this object, since i noticed several truckers and motorists looking up.  realizing that i was now going only 40 mph as well as a few people around me, i became aware that this object could perhaps cause an accident.  because of this fact, and the fact that i now needed a new pair of pants, i called the state police and talked to the sergeant on duty at the wilmington branch.  he was very professional and said he would have a trooper report to the area immediately.  

i do not know if anything was ever reported by the state police, or if anything else ever came of the situation, i left the area very quickly and have only been back through during the day.  if anyone doubts my thoughts and views on this matter, please let me give you a bit of my background so perhaps you can understand my reasoning.  i am a mechanical engineering student at the university of cincinnati, so i understand the basics of what is and isn���t possible with aircraft.  i grew up near the naval air station in pensacola, florida where my father was stationed with the marines in the air wing.  over the years i have seen my share of aircraft fly ranging from biplanes, wwii era prop fighters and bombers, to modern day fighters and bombers including the f-117 stealth fighter, b-1 and b-2 bombers, and specialty aircraft such as the sr-71 blackbird and uavs such as the predator.  besides fixed wing vehicles, i have also seen several examples of helicopters from loaches, hueys, blackhawks, apaches, cobras, and chinooks, to private crafts like medivacs, and other search and rescue craft.  being from east central ohio i have had my encounters with blimps (goodyear) and with hot-air balloons too. 

i know that this area that i was traveling through is in the approach and exit patterns for wright-patt air force base and port columbus international, but i have never seen any fixed wing aircraft that can hover or move as slowly as these objects did, or any other aircraft with this distinct shape and light pattern.  hopefully someone else saw these events too.
content.distance: 21-100 Feet, 101-500 Feet, 501 Feet - 1 Mile, Over 1 Mile
content.summary: Strange lights and craft sighting in southwest ohio

content.detailedDescription: My family and i were on the way back from eating out.It was about 9 o'clock pm and dark. i can't remember what month that it was or the exact year but it was cold and i was around 15 to 16 years old. we were in a dodge caravan and i was in the back. i was looking out the window as we starting going down the hill down by our house when i saw a triangular object right over the trees. i yelled "look!!!" and my dad stopped the van. we sat there for a minute and my mother started screaming "let's go now". my brother and i jumped out of the car so my dad could drop off my mother.My mother did not want us to get out but the amazement made us do it anyways. we told our dad to grab the camera and come back. my dad took off peeling the wheels as he left. as soon as the car was gone there was no noise. nothing at all. the object had moved closer to us and was floating right over the pond. it was right at tree level so you could see it really well. it was black with a white light glowing at each corner. i think after the shock and wonder wore off we starting getting scared. my dad was not back yet and we were out in the country by ourselves with this thing. my brother and i started to run towards our house and next thing you know it was following us. it came over the street and followed us 1/4 mile. my dad pulled up and right then it started back over the trees. we tried our best to follow it but it got away. this is not the first or last experience that i have had, but it is one that i had more than just myself there to witness it. all that i can say is that i have never been able to forget the feeling of wonder and fear that i had at the moment we sat there and watched this thing float around without a sound.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Triangle object hovering over the trees ,light on every corner , no noise.

content.detailedDescription:
While ice fishing with my son sean hansen and friend darren borders we went out side on a clear winter night. i saw an object hovering over the ne side of lower south long lake. we were positioned near the center and east side. i asked the boys to come outside and look at it. we all observed for about an hour an object that would dart from one horizon to the other and at amazing speed. and at dofferent altitudes. it would move at right angles as well.

the real amazing thing is this object moved slowly from the horizon to a position exactly over our ice fishing house on the lake. there it hovered for seemed like forever, probably 20 minutes. it was straight over head. it made no noises at all. super silent. it then moved away slowly and excellerated to a super high rate of speed off into the night sky.

two weeks later i asked a fiend of mine marv bednar and his who lives on the south bay of the lake if they saw something starange in the sky 2 weeks prior. he saud "yes, kitty and i saw it through the kittchen window for a while, it was wierd".

others must have seen this object! i would have reported this sooner but really did not know where to go with this.

i am a big time winter ice fisherman and unfortunatly forgot my camera that weekend.

skip hansen
i am 47 years old, a proffesional electrical engineer and have been married for 25 years.

ps; we purchased property on upper south long lake in 2001 and still ice fish alot and allways look in the sky now for it but it has not been seen by us since 2000. military camp ripley is not to far from us to the west. maybe an aircraft from there?? i doubt it as i have flown many times in comercial aircraft and have flown in small planes for years with friends who encouracge me to be a pilot.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Cicular object, rotating multiple colors undernieth it. towards the edge of it.  200ft approx width,

content.detailedDescription: I was riding my dirt bike and chain came off, i was off fixing it when i saw a light out of the corner of my eye and when i looked up it was already over my head, about 100 foot up in the air bigger than my house which is 24 ft x 28 ft square, and glowing white. it made no noise at all and zoomed out of sight. approxamatly 10 second from start to finish. there was no smell or any thing. i live way out in the country and there were no houses close and no streetlights etc...   this thing was huge and totally silent and a glowing white, kinda like the way the moon glows but brighter yet not so bright as to hurt your eyes, i had no trouble looking right at it. it was very exciting and something i will never forget. i finished fixing my dirt bike and went straight home to tell my family what i saw.
content.summary: Silent glowing white disc shaped object 100 foot off the ground

content.detailedDescription:
Several college friends had a ufo experience where they said they thought they seen a ufo.  somehow they said it made their car radio cut in and out strangely.  i think even some other things happened to them.

then the next day they told me about this and i said,"take me out to this area where this all happened."  we drove on highway f outside the university of wisconsin-river falls campus at night for about a few miles.  i have no idea any more how long of a period that was.  we remarked at the strange appearance of a almost ghostly image of a extremely skinny armed and legged being that even just about hovered but ran across the road very quickly but with extremely wide stride walking!  it had no clothes whatsoever but appeared to have had only skin and possible bones and that is it!  we both said simultaneously," what was that!"  we had no clue of what it was but i and the driver of the car in the fron seat, named kathy borgan at that time seen it together.  wendy lindstrom in the back seat did not see it like we did in the front seat. the more i got to thinking about what exactly i had seen that night, i had even considered seeing a actual ghost!  then i thought it kept the distance apart from our car as it crossed the road.  i also considered it to be a person made out of a "gas and not even skin and bone."  it was that strange to figure out.  i will never forget what i saw that night because it kept a 50-60 or even 70' distance from the front of the car as it crossed in front of us as we traveled on the road!!!!!!!!!!!!!Like with it's mind. (?)
honest to god this is true. it was our 1970-1971 college school year. we were all freshman.  i was at the university one more year after that. it could have even been in the tail end of 1970 instead of 1971 because too much time has gone since that happened.  i don't remember reporting it to the police but we may have.  we were scared.  it also had no hair of any type.  i can demonstrate how it walked across the road with it's skinny arms swinging and legs back and forth walking.
content.summary: Possible alien entity sighted in the same area as a ufo was seen the previous day.

content.detailedDescription: I am a truck driver. i have a team driver who was sitting in the passenger seat at the time and saw the exact same thing i did. we were traveling south approximately 50 miles north of roswell. when i realized we would be travelling through roswell, i made a comment to todd that we should watch th sky and look for ufos. literally seconds later, todd pointed ahead and slightly to the left and said look at that light. by the time i looked it had dissappeared. a few seconds later, it reappeared. i saw it this time. it lasted a couple of seconds and then disappeared. i said that it was probably just a flashing light on top of an antenna tower. a few seconds later it reappeared only much closer. we knew at that point that it wasn't a tower. it disappeared again and then reappeared closer still. this time, it stayed. a second light appeared just to the left of the first and stayed, and a second later, a third light appeared to the left of the first two. at this point, we thought that there were three seperate units. then the three lights began to rotate from left to right and before the right most light dissappeared behing the rotating craft, a fourth light emerged from behind the craft on the left. after the first light dissappeared to the right, a fifth light appeared on the left and the second light dissappeared. at this point, todd and i were very excited. i grabbed my cell phone and started recording video with the window down. (i found out later that i had my thumb over the lens.) right after i started recording, the lights quickly faded until they dissappeared. i put up the cell phone and we kept driving in astonishment. a couple of minutes later, the three lights lit up again and began to rotate. this time, i quickly pulled the truck over on the shoulder and came to a stop while getting out the cell phone. i started recording before the truck came to a stop and immediately the lights began to dissappear, one by one. the footage is very rough because i was stopping an 18 wheeler and jumping out at the time, but i did catch one of the lights on the footage. we stood out there in front of the truck for at least ten minutes waiting for it to happen again so we could get a clean shot but it never did. we kept our eyes peeled the rest of the night but saw nothing else. i will include the two videos even though the first has nothing and the second only a single light. the reason i am reporting this is to see if anyone else saw what we saw that night. please let me know.
content.summary: Rotating lights

content.detailedDescription: I was biking to  high school around 7:15 when i was coming to a highway intersection there was a flatbed filled with constructon supplies that would eventully give me a blind spot frustrated i looked up and sighed i saw the craft traveling east and seemed to be over and behind an overpass it was a wierd silver boomarang shape unlike any plane i've seen in the sky. it had many  strobing lights that were green blue yellow and red the strobing was to fast of a frequency to my knowledge on aircraft. was moving slowly even hoverng maby 200(not positve) feet from the ground.Ihad never seen a plane fly that close to the ground  os i countinued to bike onlooking at it. after crossing the highway it stopped hovering and darted of to the north  on a right angle. as it flew of i saw a slight shift in movement as it disapperd into the distance.
content.summary: Large silver boomarang shaped craft with multple blue red yellow strobing lights hoverd for a minute then quikly flew off

content.detailedDescription: We were playing tag in a large wheat field on top of the hill, when i observed what i thought was a clear plastic kite flying in the sky to our northwest.  my first instinct was that it was a large kite that had broken loose from its string, but then upon starring at it, it began to move against the wind and started radiating a colorful swirl withing its exact diamond shaped structure.  the best description of the multi-colors i was observing was comparing it to spilt gasoline on top of water. it was as brightly colored as a rainbow but the colors swirlled in a random pattern within the diamond.  after a few seconds or so, i realized the object was probably not solid and i wanted someone else to verify what i was seeing so i hollered to my cousin and my brother who were in the field to look.  they ran to me and i pointed out the object.  we all stood in silence for a few seconds, then looked at each other.  the object appeared to be about 100 yds away and maybe 100' off the ground. i used a line off power poles to gauge the height and distance.  we decided to chase it for some unknown reason.  as we approached the object it went higher in the sky and randomly and quickly moved in numerous directions.  we wondered why it was moving away from us. as we stopped to catch our breath it began to grow in size or come closer, couldn't tell which ,then it shot north at the speed of a lightning bolt and disappeard.  we ran back to the house to tell our parents, but they all laughed. the strangest thing about viewing this object was that it seemed semi-clear but had a perfect diamond shape.  seems impossible. it was not a "sun-dog", i have seen many of these around the sun.  the object was viewed during a thunderstorm while the sky was full of lots of clouds and the sun was not directly visible. my best guess as to the size of the object was that it was about 6' wide by 6' tall. after telling our parents and calming down we went back to the hilltop about 30 minutes later to look for the object with some more cousins, but we saw nothing. my cousin and brother all agree about the size, shape, color, speed, and distance of the oject.  we have not been able to explain this observation at all.
content.summary: Irridescant, semi-clear, diamond shaped flying object observed during a thunderstorm
